"Yesterday, Arsenal at the Emirates Stadium in the Premier League 36th round match, 3-0 victory over Newcastle United, consolidate fourth place standings.Arsenalnike free 3.0 v5 mujer win this season is no longer possible to keep the top four Champions League qualification for next season to be the most realistic goal. After the game, they accumulated 73 points, and more than Everton in fifth place out of 4 points. Their last two opponents were West Brom and Norwich Petrovich, both teams fighting relegation.Arsenal took the lead in the 26th minute, Cazorla free kick in front of Koscielny Qiangdian Tongshe network. After scoring heat of the moment he would end it passed to the stands, the referee was shown a yellow card. The first 42 minutes, in front of the goalkeeper Crull Giroux continuous shot was blocked, a small area on the left Ozil easy tip-network, the score became 2:0. Ozil in the 66th minute cross from the left, jump Giroux headed home this season, scored the first 21 goals of individuals, while the score locked at 3: Real total score of 5-0 eliminated the defending champion, although the overall strength of the two teams fairly, but the gap is five goals in the tactical teams reflect the true merits of the gap. Ancelotti led the team to two round double play Bayern, whose brilliant achievements obtained nonexistent controversy, this time on the ball and the two schools counterattack PK, the latter prevailed.When the draw came out after semi-final against Real Madrid and Bayern match-ups will be deemed to be an enhanced version of the Spanish National Derby. Real Madrid coach Jose Mourinho during gradually figured out t

he Barcelona-based transmission control play, and turning the tide in the battle record, Ancelotti is inherited Mourinho left the "heritage", formation improved, then Such reinforcements Bell joined together, an enhanced version of Real Madrid counterattack tactics have been respected to the extreme. The overall strength of the powerful Bayern, three online no short board, plus Guardiola understands Tiki-Taka tactical experience, making the defending champion at the base have a full impact on the pursuit of the ball as well as a pair.The competition process is also envisaged as before, twonike free 3.0 v4 comprar strong duel not exchange that war. Bayern two rounds in the field get the absolute possession. The game, the Bundesliga Banba in possession of 64% compared with 36% overwhelm Real Madrid, but Ancelotti faced great pressure in Bayern's attack did not put the bus in front of the defensive players mainly four Defender Fernando Alonso. Pepe and Ramos only when positioning the ball and left the penalty area, Carvajal hardly involved in defense, Cohen Bertrand Gongshoupingheng, while Alonso is focused on the protection of the restricted area before the completion of the second point of interception or , so no matter how offensive Bayern, Real Madrid's defensive formation has not changed, so Guardiola's team also felt at home very difficult to tackle.Barcelona emphasis on slow play ball there fast, between carelessly Daojiao frontcourt, the use of each other's offensive player moves sent a fatal blow. The former Bayern Munich in the main emphasis on the use of offensive player's personal ability to open a gap in the frontcourt, Arjen Robben and Franck Ribery are needed space for speed-type player, so Raberg combination play Pushing

Hands, such as Real Madrid defenders stand the location of the re-instigated attack, is clearly unrealistic. Mourinho coached for three years, Real Madrid face authentic "Tiki-Taka" football has played experience, and this one is just a fancy Ancelotti Guardiola has not let the ball mainly to technology flows and brave tough German-style combine this, so do the requirements defender before lightly pressed in the game, the pursuit of the ball stand a good defensive formation of Bayern Munich, Real Madrid defender's pressure is not great, first leg home tonight Ramos opened the scoring after shot turned out, all of the pass before Bayern and Real Madrid defender endo have been easily resolved.Before the second legnike free 4.0 v2 hombre match, Real Madrid played 442 or 433 is another focus of the Western media that if ripped Isco, let BBC Trident starter, then Real Madrid's defensive ability will be greatly weakened, after all, C Ronaldo, Bell and the Benzema past almost does not participate in the game defensively. But tonight the Real Madrid striker who also actively to the side midfielder back on defense, especially Bell, who spared no effort to see the Welsh run, you know how to pursue the former Real Madrid pressed the field tonight. On the front two meters can also have the horse ran 12 seconds, as long as the ball, play anytime, anywhere Galacticos brilliant counterattack with Bayern defender tall, turned unpleasant, Bundesliga giants Real Madrid defender's grasp Vulnerability is not a difficult thing to create scoring chances.On the offensive efficiency, Real Madrid to Guardiola lesson. Leg match, Benzema Bayern penalty area in the first ball to complete the break. The header and C Ronaldo scored twice shot tonight Ramos is Real Madrid beat three time
